column2: Midnightmare Teddy... sounds rather forbidding. It looks like you can launch it through the Desktop, as well.
I'm not a big fan of scary games or movies, but I can always appreciate a math-based game. Banish those nightmares with the power of calculation!

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `Midnightmare Teddy` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `App Center` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
Use your trusty equation rifle to vanquish the nightmares coming from every direction!
